product_name: ChicoBag Vita Solstice Reusable Bag - Women's
long_description: The ChicoBag Vita Solstice is a shoulder-style reusable bag with a 40 lb. carrying capacity. It's crafted from pretty printed fabric and is perfect for trips to the market, bookstore or beach. Easy to stow in your pocket or purse with the integrated stuff pouch; stuff pouch has a drawcord adjustment and mini clip. Pouch is approximately 4 x 4 in.; fabric allows easy opening and stuffing, and no special folding is required. Wash cold and hang to dry. FYI: 1 gallon of milk weighs approximately 7 lbs.!
short_description: The ChicoBag Vita Solstice is a shoulder-style reusable bag with a 40 lb. carrying capacity. It's crafted from pretty printed fabric and is perfect for trips to the market, bookstore or beach.
